title: Central Clinical School Publications 2018
cleaned_text: Central Clinical School Publications 2018 See also: [News headlines](https://www.monash.edu/medicine/ccs/archive/ccs-news) - Annual Reports 882 journal articles, 148 review articles, 51 letters, 20 comments/debates, 13 editorials, 1 conference article, 1 meeting abstract, and 1 short survey were published during 2018. They are given under each departmental division, alpha sorted by first author name, as provided during March 2019.
